title: Get yourself a bit of the Mono
content:
Not entirely sure waht this means, but there must be someone here with a bit of spare cash for the ol' Mono!

[http://www.monotypeimaging.com/aboutus/pr\_display.aspx?year=2007&pr=306](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020064710/http:/www.monotypeimaging.com/aboutus/pr_display.aspx?year=2007&pr=306 "http://www.monotypeimaging.com/aboutus/pr\_display.aspx?year=2007&pr=306")

Muzz
author: muzzer

comments.content:
\> a bit of spare cash

Not really. We just need to know the priced offering -- e.g. 20 million shares at $30 per share. If they have a good day (Nasdaq) -- they will pay you a dividend.

BTW, later on -- for any reason -- they can reacquire shares.

Some analysis from Wall Street types here - [http://www.247wallst.com/2007/01/ipo\_filing\_mono.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020064710/http:/www.247wallst.com/2007/01/ipo_filing_mono.html "http://www.247wallst.com/2007/01/ipo\_filing\_mono.html")
